annonstext:
Is accounting and administration your thing? Are you a structured and accurate team player who is curious about digital tools and how they can help you in your work? Great! We are looking for an Accounting Assistant to our head office in Gothenburg! This is a substitute position, approximately nine months. 

Your role in our team. You are part of our Finance department and the Accounting Transaction team, a team that works with the administration process - such as accounts payable, accounts receivable, store accounting, stocktaking/inventory adjustments and/or e-commerce customer credit handling. As Accounting Assistant, you work with administration of systems, you are in contact with suppliers and our stores and you work with monthly closing procedures. You also support colleagues in the organisation when it comes to different accounting related questions.

This is a substitute position, starting as soon as possible, approximately nine months.

Is this you? We see that you are a structured person who is used to prioritise your work and keeping deadlines. Being efficient and accurate, as well as being able to see the big picture, but also details, that is right up your alley! Here at Lindex we believe in doing things together and it is important that you are a team player.

You enjoy working in an ever-changing environment, where you get to grow, learn new things and work with colleagues from different parts of a company. Leading yourself, being active in your own development and giving and taking feedback are all things you know well. You are curious about digital tools and how they can support you and help you to improve your work. You believe in togetherness and you are motivated by the possibility to make an impact. Also, this probably sounds like you:   

Higher studies within Economics, Finance, Business or similar
Previous work experience in accounts payable, accounts receivable and other financial transactions
Basic knowledge of accounting principals
Swedish and English, both spoken and written
Meritorious: experience from Microsoft Dynamics, Basware and/or Save Solution, experience from the retail industry
We are Lindex. A growing global fashion company from Sweden. We exist to empower and inspire women everywhere. It is our higher purpose as a company. Our dedication to women, sustainability and customer focus runs through everything. It is a mindset that is with us every step of our journey. A journey towards being a global, digital first, brand-led and sustainable fashion company.

At Lindex, everything we do is powered by people. We are like a big family here, with values to help us grow. And we believe in doing things together. Because two are more than one and together we can make a greater impact. If you feel the same, then we are probably a great match.

Do you have a good feeling about this and want to join our journey? Apply today, we can’t wait to get to know more about you. Since we are eager in finding the right person to join our team, we will apply continuous selection. This means we might close the process before the set ending date. Since we like to keep it simple, we ask you to apply online (and not by e-mail).
